title: World ranking of professional golf players 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Golfer in the x axis and Average points in the y axis.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The lowest value at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN) is 2.2x times less than the highest value at Rory McIlroy (NIR).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average points for 20 number of Golfers.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Golfer in the x axis and Average points in the y axis.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The lowest value at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN) is 2.2x times less than the highest value at Rory McIlroy (NIR).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average points for 20 number of Golfers.
The Average points is appeared to be the highest at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) and lowest at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
The lowest value at Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN) is 2.2x times less than the highest value at Rory McIlroy (NIR).
Average points at Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) is 9.48 , second place is Jon Rahm (ESP) at 8.68, and thirdly is Brooks Koepka (USA) at 8.62.
The Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) tends to be 1.59 percent higher than average.
The Average points is 119.27 if we add up values of all Golfers.
